name: Taz: Wanted
description:
Taz: Wanted is an arcade game developed by Blitz Games. It was originally released in 2002. It was published by Infogrames Entertainment. On review aggregator Metacritic, Taz: Wanted has a score of 62. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Taz: Wanted on PlayStation 2, Xbox, GameCube and PC.
